Contacting Borland Developer Support

Borland offers a variety of support options. These include free services on the Internet, where you can search our extensive information base and connect with other users of Borland products. In addition, you can choose from several categories of support, ranging from support on installations of a Borland product to fee-based consultant-level support and extensive assistance.

For more information about Borland's developer support services, see our web site at For more information about Borland's support services, please see our Web site at http://support.borland.com. On this Web site, you can access many newsgroups where StarTeam users exchange information, tips, and techniques.

For access to additional information, articles, code examples, and upcoming news about StarTeam, refer to the Borland Community site at http://community.borland.com.

When contacting support, be prepared to provide complete information about your environment, the version of the product you are using, and a detailed description of the problem.

For support on third-party tools or documentation, contact the vendor of the tool.
